info.description: List APIs of Healthy Management Service
info.title: Healthy Service API Document

get.description: Returns a list of experts available in the system

parameters.description: Number of experts per page (default is 10)
parameters.name: limit

403.description: You do not have permission to access this resource

post.description: Create expert profile with file image and json expert data
Create a new expert account with email and password

403.description: You do not have permission to access this resource

post.description: Reset expert password with email and new password

403.description: You do not have permission to access this resource

patch.description: Lock expert account by expert ID

403.description: You do not have permission to access this resource

patch.description: Unlock expert account by expert ID

403.description: You do not have permission to access this resource

put.description: Updates an expert's details based on their ID.

500.description: Internal server error during expert update

delete.description: Soft delete an expert profile by ID. Optionally deactivate the linked user account.

401.description: Unauthorized - Missing or invalid API key

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have permission

get.description: Get a list of users with pagination

parameters.description: Number of users per page (default is 10)
parameters.name: limit

post.description: Create a new user account with email and password
Reset user password with email and new password

get.description: Get user details by user ID

patch.description: Lock user account by user ID
Unlock user account by user ID

post.description: Login to the system with email and password
Change password for the logged-in user

401.description: Token must be in Bearer format

403.description: You do not have permission to access this resource

post.description: Register a new account with email and password
Refresh access token using refresh token
Verify OTP for account registration or password reset
Creates a new activity for a specified level, including repeat days. Requires valid JWT token.
post.summary: Create a new activity for a level

400.description: invalid activity data, invalid level ID, invalid activity type, or invalid week day

post.description: Creates a new level for a specified program owned by the expert. Requires valid JWT token.
post.summary: Create a new level for a program

400.description: invalid level data or invalid program ID

put.description: Updates program details (title, description, duration, disease IDs, goal IDs) for a program owned by the expert. Requires valid JWT token.

400.description: invalid program ID or invalid program data

404.description: expert not found or program not found

delete.description: Deletes a program if it has no participants, or deactivates it (sets is_active = false)
delete.summary: Delete or deactivate a program by ID

400.description: invalid program ID or confirmation required

post.description: Create user profile with file image and json profile

put.description: Update user profile with file image and json profile
